aka: 世界の空から～ときめきトレイン(日)
this_title: World's Greatest Train Journeys from Above Season 1
trans_title: 世界极致铁路之旅 第一季
世界の空から～ときめきトレイン(日)
introduction: This 6-part series will follow some of the world’s most extraordinary railway journeys from above and on the ground, taking the audience on an adventure of a lifetime. We’ll fly above spectacular scenery and explore exceptional engineering; meeting the people who maintain and run these incredible railroads as well as those who live alongside them.EPISODE GUIDE (Series 1):- Glacier Express- Canada's Wilderness Railroad- Copper Canyon Railway- Darjeeling Himalayan Railway- Australia's Outback Railway- Norway's Bergen Railway
chinese_title: 世界极致铁路之旅 第一季
foreign_title: World's Greatest Train Journeys from Above Season 1
